ai-patthana8.14:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.14:1.1_0: Not by the teaching doesn’t give rise to the cause, nor reason.
ai-patthana8.14:1.1_1: Or consciousness doesn’t give rise to the cause or reason.
ai-patthana8.14:1.1_2: thoughts that are not a cause or reason.
ai-patthana8.14:2.1_0: Neither things don’t give rise to the three things.
ai-patthana8.14:3.1_0: and not for the sake of defilement, not for the sake of defilement.
ai-patthana8.14:3.1_1: and not for the sake of defilement and not for the sake of defilement.
ai-patthana8.14:3.1_2: thoughts that are not a cause or reason.
ai-patthana8.14:3.1_3: This is the section in brief.
